articles.title: √âcrire une lettre d'amour en portugais : La saudade en mots
articles.content:
## L'art de la carta de amor portugaise

Le portugais, avec sa "saudade" et sa musicalit√©, est une langue parfaite pour les lettres d'amour. Voici comment d√©clarer vos sentiments avec toute la profondeur lusophone.

## Formules d'ouverture

### "Meu amor" / "Amor da minha vida"
**Prononciation :** M√â-ou a-MOR / a-MOR da MI-nya VI-da

**Signification :** Mon amour / Amour de ma vie

### "Minha alma g√©mea"
**Prononciation :** MI-nya AL-ma J√â-m√©-a

**Signification :** Mon √¢me s≈ìur

### "Meu cora√ß√£o"
**Prononciation :** M√â-ou ko-ra-SAON

**Signification :** Mon c≈ìur

## Exprimer l'amour profond

### "Voc√™ √© a melhor coisa que j√° me aconteceu"
**Prononciation :** vo-S√ä √© a m√©-LYOR KOY-za k√© JA m√© a-kon-t√©-S√â-ou

**Signification :** Tu es la meilleure chose qui me soit jamais arriv√©e

### "Meu cora√ß√£o pertence a voc√™ para sempre"
**Prononciation :** M√â-ou ko-ra-SAON p√©r-T√âN-s√© a vo-S√ä PA-ra S√âN-pr√©

**Signification :** Mon c≈ìur t'appartient pour toujours

### "Cada dia que passa, te amo mais"
**Prononciation :** KA-da DI-a k√© PA-sa t√© A-mo MA√èSS

**Signification :** Chaque jour qui passe, je t'aime davantage

## Expressions po√©tiques

### "Voc√™ √© a poesia que minha alma buscava"
**Prononciation :** vo-S√ä √© a po-√©-ZI-a k√© MI-nya AL-ma bous-KA-va

**Signification :** Tu es la po√©sie que mon √¢me cherchait

### "Nos seus olhos encontrei meu lar"
**Prononciation :** nouss S√â-ouss O-lyouss √©n-kon-TR√â√è M√â-ou LAR

**Signification :** Dans tes yeux j'ai trouv√© ma maison

### "Voc√™ √© meu presente e todos os meus amanh√£s"
**Prononciation :** vo-S√ä √© M√â-ou pr√©-Z√âN-t√© i TO-douss ouss M√â-ouss a-ma-NYANSS

**Signification :** Tu es mon pr√©sent et tous mes lendemains

## D√©crire ce que l'autre apporte

### "Com voc√™ descobri o que √© amar de verdade"
**Prononciation :** kon vo-S√ä d√©ss-ko-BRI o k√© √© a-MAR d√© v√©r-DA-d√©

**Signification :** Avec toi j'ai d√©couvert ce qu'est aimer vraiment

### "Voc√™ me faz querer ser uma pessoa melhor"
**Prononciation :** vo-S√ä m√© FASS k√©-R√âR s√©r OU-ma p√©-SO-a m√©-LYOR

**Signification :** Tu me fais vouloir √™tre une meilleure personne

### "Seu amor me transforma"
**Prononciation :** S√â-ou a-MOR m√© transs-FOR-ma

**Signification :** Ton amour me transforme

## Engagements et promesses

### "Prometo te amar nos momentos bons e dif√≠ceis"
**Prononciation :** pro-M√â-to t√© a-MAR nouss mo-M√âN-touss BONSS i di-FI-s√©√Øss

**Signification :** Je promets de t'aimer dans les bons moments et les difficiles

### "Estarei sempre ao seu lado, aconte√ßa o que acontecer"
**Prononciation :** √©ss-ta-R√â√è S√âN-pr√© a-ou S√â-ou LA-do a-kon-T√â-sa o k√© a-kon-t√©-S√âR

**Signification :** Je serai toujours √† tes c√¥t√©s, quoi qu'il arrive

### "Meu amor por voc√™ √© infinito e eterno"
**Prononciation :** M√â-ou a-MOR por vo-S√ä √© in-fi-NI-to i √©-T√âR-no

**Signification :** Mon amour pour toi est infini et √©ternel

## Formules de conclusion

### "Seu/Sua para sempre"
**Prononciation :** S√â-ou/SOU-a PA-ra S√âN-pr√©

**Signification :** √Ä toi pour toujours

### "Com todo meu amor e minha alma"
**Prononciation :** kon TO-do M√â-ou a-MOR i MI-nya AL-ma

**Signification :** Avec tout mon amour et mon √¢me

### "Te amo hoje, amanh√£ e para sempre"
**Prononciation :** t√© A-mo O-j√© a-ma-NYAN i PA-ra S√âN-pr√©

**Signification :** Je t'aime aujourd'hui, demain et pour toujours

## Le concept de Saudade dans la lettre

Int√©grez la "saudade" - ce manque doux-amer :
- "Tenho saudades de voc√™ mesmo quando estamos juntos" (Tu me manques m√™me quand on est ensemble)
- "A saudade que sinto √© prova do meu amor" (La saudade que je ressens est preuve de mon amour)

## Diff√©rences Br√©sil / Portugal

**Au Br√©sil :** Plus chaleureux, "voc√™" courant
**Au Portugal :** "Tu" plus intime, ton plus r√©serv√©

## Conseils culturels

**Musicalit√© :** Le portugais chante - lisez votre lettre √† voix haute.

**Po√©sie :** Citer Fernando Pessoa impressionnera.

**Manuscrite :** L'effort de l'√©criture √† la main est tr√®s appr√©ci√©.

## Conclusion

Une lettre d'amour en portugais vibre de saudade et de passion. Ces expressions vous permettront de toucher profond√©ment le c≈ìur de votre partenaire lusophone. O amor verdadeiro se escreve com o cora√ß√£o. (Le vrai amour s'√©crit avec le c≈ìur.)

articles.title: √áek√ße Barƒ±≈üma ve Uzla≈üma ƒ∞fadeleri
articles.content:
Tartƒ±≈ümalardan sonra barƒ±≈ümak, saƒülƒ±klƒ± bir ili≈ükinin √∂nemli bir par√ßasƒ±dƒ±r. √áek√ße konu≈üan partnerinizle barƒ±≈üma ifadelerini bilmek ili≈ükinizi g√º√ßlendirir.

## Temel Barƒ±≈üma ƒ∞fadeleri

### 1. "Promi≈à za to, co jsem ≈ôekl/a"
**Telaffuz:** *Prominy za to, tso ysem jekel/a*

**Anlam:** "S√∂ylediklerim i√ßin √∂z√ºr dilerim"

### 2. "M≈Ø≈æeme zaƒç√≠t znovu?"
**Telaffuz:** *Mujeme za√ßit znovu?*

**Anlam:** "Yeniden ba≈ülayabilir miyiz?"

### 3. "Nesn√°≈°√≠m se s tebou h√°dat"
**Telaffuz:** *Nesna≈üim se s tebou hadat*

**Anlam:** "Seninle kavga etmekten nefret ediyorum"

### 4. "Nechoƒème sp√°t na≈°tvan√≠"
**Telaffuz:** *Nehodyme spat na≈ütvani*

**Anlam:** "Kƒ±zgƒ±n yatmayalƒ±m"

### 5. "Odpou≈°t√≠m ti"
**Telaffuz:** *Odpou≈ütim ti*

**Anlam:** "Seni affediyorum"

### 6. "Mƒõl/a jsem nepravdu"
**Telaffuz:** *Myel/a ysem nepravdu*

**Anlam:** "Yanƒ±lmƒ±≈üƒ±m"

### 7. "Jak to mohu napravit?"
**Telaffuz:** *Yak to mohu napravit?*

**Anlam:** "Bunu nasƒ±l telafi edebilirim?"

### 8. "Miluji tƒõ v√≠c ne≈æ tuhle h√°dku"
**Telaffuz:** *Miluyi tye vits nej tuhle hadku*

**Anlam:** "Seni bu tartƒ±≈ümadan daha √ßok seviyorum"

### 9. "Vy≈ôe≈°me to spoleƒçnƒõ"
**Telaffuz:** *Vƒ±re≈üme to spole√ßne*

**Anlam:** "Bunu birlikte √ß√∂zelim"

### 10. "Chyb√≠ mi, jak jsme byli p≈ôed h√°dkou"
**Telaffuz:** *Hƒ±bi mi, yak ysme bƒ±li pred hadkou*

**Anlam:** "Kavgadan √∂nceki halimizi √∂zl√ºyorum"

### 11. "Jsi pro mƒõ v≈°echno"
**Telaffuz:** *Ysi pro mnye f≈üehno*

**Anlam:** "Sen benim i√ßin her ≈üeysin"

### 12. "Slibuji, ≈æe se zlep≈°√≠m"
**Telaffuz:** *Slibuyi, je se zlep≈üim*

**Anlam:** "Daha iyi olmaya s√∂z veriyorum"

## √áek K√ºlt√ºr√ºnde Barƒ±≈üma

"L√°sko" (a≈ükƒ±m) veya "Mil√°ƒçku" (sevgilim) hitaplarƒ± barƒ±≈ümayƒ± yumu≈üatƒ±r.

Bu ifadelerle √áek√ße konu≈üan partnerinizle samimi barƒ±≈ümalar ya≈üayabilirsiniz.

articles.title: Ukraynaca Ogrenmek Zor mu? T√ºrkler Icin Rehber
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Ukraynaca, 40 milyondan fazla konusaniyla √∂nemli bir Slav dilidir. Peki T√ºrkce konusanlar icin Ukraynaca zor mu?

## Genel Bakis

<PhraseOfDay
  word="–ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∞ —Ä–æ–±–∏—Ç—å –º–∞–π—Å—Ç—Ä–∞"
  translation="Pratik usta yapar"
  pronunciation="prak-ti-ka ro-bit mays-tra"
  context="Ukraynaca ogrenmede en onemli kural"
/>

### Dil Aileleri

- **T√ºrkce**: Altay dil ailesi
- **Ukraynaca**: Hint-Avrupa dil ailesi (Slavic)

<CultureTip title="Ukraynaca vs. Rusca" flag="üá∫üá¶">
Ukraynaca ve Rusca kardes dillerdir ama farkli dillerdir. Ukraynaca daha melodik ve Lehce'ye daha yakindir.
</CultureTip>

## Ukraynaca'nin Kolay Y√∂nleri

### 1. Hal Sistemi Benzerligi

T√ºrkce'nin hal ekleri Ukraynaca'nin hallerine benzer:

| T√ºrkce | Ukraynaca | Anlam |
|--------|-----------|-------|
| evde | –≤ –¥–æ–º—ñ | evde |
| eve | –¥–æ –¥–æ–º—É | eve |

### 2. Tutarli Telaffuz

Alfabe √∂grenildiginde telaffuz tutarlidir.

### 3. Artikelsiz Dil

"The" veya "a" yoktur - T√ºrkce gibi!

### 4. Melodik Ses

Ukraynaca daha yumusak ve melodik bir Slav dilidir.

## Ukraynaca'nin Zor Y√∂nleri

### 1. Kiril Alfabesi

33 harflik alfabe √∂grenilmeli.

### 2. Yedi Hal

| Hal | T√ºrkce Karsiligi |
|----|------------------|
| –ù–∞–∑–∏–≤–Ω–∏–π | Yalƒ±n hal |
| –†–æ–¥–æ–≤–∏–π | -in, -nin |
| –î–∞–≤–∞–ª—å–Ω–∏–π | -e, -a |
| –ó–Ω–∞—Ö—ñ–¥–Ω–∏–π | -i, -yi |
| –û—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–π | ile |
| –ú—ñ—Å—Ü–µ–≤–∏–π | -de |
| –ö–ª–∏—á–Ω–∏–π | Seslenme |

### 3. Cinsiyet Sistemi

√úc cinsiyet: erkek, disi, n√∂tr.

### 4. Fiil G√∂r√ºn√ºs√º

Tamamlanmis ve tamamlanmamis fiil ciftleri.

## Ogrenme S√ºresi

| Seviye | S√ºre |
|--------|------|
| A1 | 4-6 ay |
| A2 | 8-14 ay |
| B1 | 14-24 ay |
| B2 | 2-3 yil |

## Ciftler Icin Avantajlar

1. **S√ºrekli pratik** - G√ºnl√ºk konusma
2. **Motivasyon** - Sevdiginiz icin √∂grenme
3. **K√ºlt√ºrel derinlik** - Ukrayna k√ºlt√ºr√ºn√º anlama

## Basari Ipuclari

### 1. Alfabeyle Baslayin

Kiril alfabesini iyi √∂grenin.

### 2. Her G√ºn Pratik

| Ne | S√ºre |
|----|------|
| Konusma | 30+ dakika |
| Dinleme | 1+ saat |

### 3. Ukrayna Medyasi

- Ukrayna m√ºzigi ve filmleri
- YouTube kanallari

## Sonuc: Zor mu?

Ukraynaca, T√ºrkce konusanlar icin:
- **Orta-zor** bir dildir
- **Alfabe ve cinsiyet** en zor kisimlar
- **Hal sistemi** T√ºrkce benzerligi avantaj
- **Melodik ses** √∂grenmeyi keyifli kilar

<PhraseOfDay
  word="–•—Ç–æ –ø–∏—Ç–∞—î, —Ç–æ–π –Ω–µ –±–ª—É–¥–∏—Ç—å"
  translation="Soran kaybolmaz"
  pronunciation="hto pi-ta-ye, toy ne blu-dit"
  context="Konusmaktan cekInmeyin!"
/>

## √ñƒürenmeye Devam Et

- **[Ukraynaca Telaffuz](/learn/tr/uk/ukrainian-pronunciation-guide/)** - Sesleri √∂ƒürenin
- **[Temel Ukraynaca ƒ∞fadeler](/learn/tr/uk/ukrainian-essential-phrases-for-couples/)** - Pratik ileti≈üim
- **[Ukraynaca Zor mu?](/learn/tr/uk/is-ukrainian-hard-to-learn/)** - D√ºr√ºst analiz
- **[Ukraynaca Selamla≈ümalar](/learn/tr/uk/ukrainian-greetings-farewells/)** - Temel konu≈üma

<CTA text="Ukraynaca maceraniza baslamaya hazƒ±r misiniz?" buttonText="Simdi Baslayƒ±n" />

articles.title: Norweska gramatyka dla par: Podstawy, kt√≥re pokochasz
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Zaczynacie przygodƒô z norweskim jako para? Podstawowa gramatyka nie musi byƒá nudna! Kiedy uczycie siƒô dla siebie nawzajem, ka≈ºda regu≈Ça staje siƒô narzƒôdziem do piƒôkniejszej komunikacji. Dzisiaj poznacie fundamenty norweskiej gramatyki, kt√≥re natychmiast wykorzystacie w romantycznych rozmowach z partnerem.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Jeg elsker deg"
  translation="Kocham ciƒô"
  pronunciation="jaj EHL-sehr dej"
  context="Najwa≈ºniejsze zdanie, kt√≥re musisz znaƒá - u≈ºywaj ich codziennie!"
/>

## Dlaczego norweska gramatyka jest ≈Çatwiejsza, ni≈º my≈õlisz?

Norweski to jeden z naj≈Çatwiejszych jƒôzyk√≥w dla Polak√≥w! Nie ma rodzaju gramatycznego, czasy sƒÖ prostsze ni≈º w polskim, a szyk zda≈Ñ podobny do angielskiego. Najlepsze? Norwedzy rozumiejƒÖ nawet b≈Çƒôdy, bo ceniƒÖ ka≈ºdƒÖ pr√≥bƒô m√≥wienia po ichnemu.

## Podstawy: Osoby i czasownik "byƒá"

Czasownik **√• v√¶re** (byƒá) to fundament ka≈ºdej rozmowy:

<ConjugationTable
  verb="√• v√¶re"
  meaning="byƒá"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "Ja", polish: "jeg er", english: "I am" },
    { person: "Ty", polish: "du er", english: "you are" },
    { person: "On/ona", polish: "han/hun er", english: "he/she is" },
    { person: "My", polish: "vi er", english: "we are" },
    { person: "Wy", polish: "dere er", english: "you are" },
    { person: "Oni/one", polish: "de er", english: "they are" }
  ]}
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Jeg er glad i deg"
  translation="Jestem w tobie zakochany"
  pronunciation="jaj ehr glahd i dej"
  example="Powiedz to swojemu partnerowi!"
/>

## Proste zdania: SVO jak w angielskim!

Norweski u≈ºywa prostego szyku: **Podmiot ‚Üí Czasownik ‚Üí Dope≈Çnienie**, dok≈Çadnie jak po angielsku!

| Polskie zdanie | Norweskie zdanie | Wymowa | Uwaga |
|----------------|------------------|---------|-------|
| **Kocham ciƒô** | Jeg elsker deg | jaj EHL-sehr dej | Podstawowa forma |
| **Tƒôskniƒô za tobƒÖ** | Jeg savner deg | jaj SAHV-nehr dej | Proste SVO |
| **Rozumiem** | Jeg forst√•r | jaj for-STOHR | Czasownik na ko≈Ñcu |
| **Czy ty mnie rozumiesz?** | Forst√•r du meg? | for-STOHR doo mahj | Pytanie - czasownik pierwszy! |

<CultureTip flag="üá≥üá¥" title="Pytania po norwesku">
W pytaniach po prostu zamieniasz kolejno≈õƒá: **Czasownik ‚Üí Podmiot**. ≈ªadnych "czy" ani innych s≈Ç√≥wek! "Elsker du meg?" (Kochasz mnie?)
</CultureTip>

## Romantyczne czasowniki, kt√≥re musisz znaƒá

Oto najwa≈ºniejsze czasowniki dla par:

| Czasownik | T≈Çumaczenie | Wymowa | Przyk≈Çad |
|-----------|-------------|---------|----------|
| **√• elske** | kochaƒá | EHL-seh | Jeg elsker deg |
| **√• like** | lubiƒá | LEE-keh | Jeg liker deg |
| **√• savne** | tƒôskniƒá | SAHV-neh | Jeg savner deg |
| **√• kysse** | ca≈Çowaƒá | KIH-seh | Jeg vil kysse deg |
| **√• klemme** | przytulaƒá | KLEH-meh | Jeg vil klemme deg |
| **√• ringe** | dzwoniƒá | RING-eh | Jeg ringer deg |
| **√• m√∏te** | spotykaƒá | MOO-teh | Jeg m√∏ter deg |

<VocabCard
  word="Vil du v√¶re min?"
  translation="Czy bƒôdziesz mojƒÖ?"
  pronunciation="vih doo VEH-reh min"
  example="Romantyczne pytanie - idealne na kolacji!"
/>

## Zaimki osobowe - twoja podstawa

Bez zaimk√≥w ani rusz! Oto najwa≈ºniejsze:

- **jeg** (ja) - "jaj"
- **du** (ty) - "doo"
- **han** (on) - "hahn"
- **hun** (ona) - "hoon"
- **vi** (my) - "vee"
- **dere** (wy) - "DEH-reh"
- **de** (oni/one) - "deh"

<CultureTip flag="üá≥üá¥" title="Formalno≈õƒá po norwesku">
Norwedzy sƒÖ super nieformalni! U≈ºywaj **du** z ka≈ºdym - nawet z te≈õciami. Formalne "Pan/Pani" praktycznie nie istniejƒÖ w codziennym ≈ºyciu.
</CultureTip>

## Pytania - prostsze ni≈º my≈õlisz!

Tworzenie pyta≈Ñ po norwesku to bu≈Çka z mas≈Çem:

1. **Zamie≈Ñ kolejno≈õƒá**: Czasownik ‚Üí Podmiot
2. **Dodaj pytajnik** na ko≈Ñcu
3. **Gotowe!**

| Zdanie twierdzƒÖce | Pytanie | Wymowa |
|-------------------|---------|---------|
| Du elsker meg | Elsker du meg? | EHL-sehr doo mahj? |
| Du forst√•r | Forst√•r du? | for-STOHR doo? |
| Vi m√∏tes i kveld | M√∏tes vi i kveld? | MOO-tehs vee i kvehl? |

## Przydatne wyra≈ºenia dla par

Oto zdania, kt√≥re wykorzystasz od zaraz:

<VocabCard
  word="Hva heter du?"
  translation="Jak masz na imiƒô?"
  pronunciation="vah HEH-tehr doo"
  example="Pierwsze pytanie do poznania!"
/>

1. **Hva heter du?** (Jak masz na imiƒô?) - *vah HEH-tehr doo?*
2. **Jeg heter...** (Nazywam siƒô...) - *jaj HEH-tehr...*
3. **Hyggelig √• m√∏te deg** (Mi≈Ço ciƒô poznaƒá) - *H√ú-geh-lee √• MOO-teh dej*
4. **Hvor kommer du fra?** (SkƒÖd jeste≈õ?) - *vohr KOH-mehr doo frah?*
5. **Jeg kommer fra Polen** (Jestem z Polski) - *jaj KOH-mehr frah POH-lehn*

## Najczƒôstsze b≈Çƒôdy i jak ich unikaƒá

### 1. **"Er" zamiast "er"**
**B≈ÇƒÖd**: "Jeg er kald" (zimny)
**Poprawnie**: "Jeg fryser" (jaj FR√ú-sehr) - zimno mi

### 2. **Polskie "czy"**
**B≈ÇƒÖd**: "Czy du elsker meg?"
**Poprawnie**: "Elsker du meg?" (bez "czy"!)

### 3. **Zapomniany czasownik**
**B≈ÇƒÖd**: "Jeg glad" (bez "er")
**Poprawnie**: "Jeg er glad" (jaj ehr glahd)

## Szybka ≈õciƒÖgawka - zapisz sobie!

| Funkcja | Norweski | Wymowa |
|---------|----------|---------|
| **Kocham ciƒô** | Jeg elsker deg | jaj EHL-sehr dej |
| **Tƒôskniƒô** | Jeg savner deg | jaj SAHV-nehr dej |
| **Jak siƒô masz?** | Hvordan g√•r det? | VOR-dahn gohr deh? |
| **Dobrze** | Bra | brah |
| **≈πle** | D√•rlig | DOHR-lee |
| **Zawsze** | Alltid | AHL-tih |
| **Nigdy** | Aldri | AHL-dree |

## Co dalej na waszej wsp√≥lnej drodze?

Gratulacje! Znacie ju≈º fundamenty norweskiej gramatyki. Teraz czas na:
- [Romantyczne frazy na ka≈ºdƒÖ okazjƒô](/learn/pl/no/romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion/)
- [Norweskie pieszczotliwe imiona](/learn/pl/no/norwegian-pet-names-for-your-partner/)
- [Podstawowe zwroty dla par](/learn/pl/no/essential-norwegian-phrases-for-couples/)

Pamiƒôtajcie: nauka jƒôzyka z partnerem to nie tylko gramatyka - to wasza wsp√≥lna przygoda! Codziennie ƒáwiczcie te podstawowe formy, a z czasem zaskoczycie samych siebie, jak p≈Çynnie potraficie rozmawiaƒá po norwesku.

<CTA />

sections: ## Najczƒôstsze b≈Çƒôdy i jak ich unikaƒá

articles.title: –ü–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—É –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π: –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

–ü—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ el aniversario –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π —Å–º—ã—Å–ª —ç—Ç–æ–º—É –æ—Å–æ–±–æ–º—É —Å–ª—É—á–∞—é. –ë—É–¥—å —Ç–æ –≤–∞—à –ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ juntos –∏–ª–∏ –∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è el aniversario, –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞—à–µ–π el amor –Ω–∞ —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞ –¥–µ–º–æ–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –∑–∞–±–æ—Ç—É –∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –≤–∞—à–∏–º –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è–º.

–î–ª—è –ø–æ–≤—Å–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –æ–∑–Ω–∞–∫–æ–º—å—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –Ω–∞—à–∏–º —Ä—É–∫–æ–≤–æ–¥—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º [—Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π –Ω–∞ –≤—Å–µ —Å–ª—É—á–∞–∏ –∂–∏–∑–Ω–∏](/blog/ru/spanish-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion).

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Feliz aniversario"
  translation="–° –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–æ–π"
  pronunciation="Feliz aniversario"
  context="–ò–¥–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–± –ø–æ–ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞ –≤ –≤–∞—à –æ—Å–æ–±—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å."
/>

## –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞—è –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã

<VocabCard
  word="el aniversario"
  translation="–≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞"
  pronunciation="el aniversario"
  example="–°–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –Ω–∞—à–∞ el aniversario!"
/>

| Spanish | –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π | –ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ |
|---|---|---|
| el aniversario | –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ | –û—Å–æ–±–∞—è –¥–∞—Ç–∞ |
| a√±os | –≥–æ–¥—ã | –í—Ä–µ–º—è –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ |
| juntos | –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ | –ï–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –∫–∞–∫ –ø–∞—Ä–∞ |
| siempre | –Ω–∞–≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ | –í–µ—á–Ω–∞—è –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å |
| el amor | –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å | –í–∞—à–∞ —Å–≤—è–∑—å |
| celebrar | –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å | –û—Ç–º–µ—á–∞—Ç—å –¥–µ–Ω—å |
| el recuerdo | –≤–æ—Å–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ | –î–æ—Ä–æ–≥–∏–µ –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã |
| el hito | –≤–µ—Ö–∞ | –í–∞–∂–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–º–µ—Ç–∫–∏ |

<CultureTip flag="üá™üá∏" title="–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–∏ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã">
–í –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö, –≥–¥–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ, –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –æ—Ç–º–µ—á–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ —É–∂–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏, –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏–º—ã–º–∏ –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–∫–∞–º–∏, –∞ –∏–Ω–æ–≥–¥–∞ –∏ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∫–ª—è—Ç–≤. –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π —é–±–∏–ª–µ–π–Ω—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç –∏–º–µ—Ç—å —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–µ–º—ã –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–∫–æ–≤.
</CultureTip>

## –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—ã–µ –ø–æ–∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—É

### –ö–æ—Ä–æ—Ç–∫–∏–µ –∏ —Å–ª–∞–¥–∫–∏–µ
- **Feliz aniversario!** - –° –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–æ–π!
- **–ï—â—ë –æ–¥–∏–Ω –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ juntos!** - –ü—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ
- **–ó–∞ –µ—â—ë –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ a√±os!** - –°–º–æ—Ç—Ä—è –≤–ø–µ—Ä—ë–¥

### –î–ª—è –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä–∞
- **–¢—ã –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—à—å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º** - –í—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
- **el amor —Ç–µ–±—è –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ —Å –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–º –¥–Ω—ë–º** - –†–∞—Å—Ç—É—â–∞—è –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å
- **–ú–æ—ë —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ siempre —Ç–≤–æ—ë** - –í–µ—á–Ω–∞—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å

<VocabCard
  word="el amor"
  translation="–ª—é–±–æ–≤—å"
  pronunciation="el amor"
  example="el amor —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ–µ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –≥–æ–¥."
/>

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –ø–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞ –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—É

### –°–µ—Ä–¥–µ—á–Ω—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è
**"–ö–∞–∂–¥–∞—è el aniversario —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π –Ω–∞–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç –º–Ω–µ, –ø–æ—á–µ–º—É —è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–ª(–∞) —Ç–µ–±—è. –¢—ã –º–æ—ë siempre."**

**"juntos –º—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—É—é –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å. –ó–∞ –µ—â—ë –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ a√±os el amor."**

### –ó–∞–¥—É–º—á–∏–≤—ã–µ –ø–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è
**"–í—Å–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞—è –Ω–∞—à–∏ el recuerdo, –º–æ—ë —Å–µ—Ä–¥—Ü–µ –Ω–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å—é. –°–ø–∞—Å–∏–±–æ, —á—Ç–æ —Ç—ã –µ—Å—Ç—å."**

**"–ö–∞–∂–¥–∞—è el hito, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—É—é –º—ã –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–≥–∞–µ–º –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ, –¥–µ–ª–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—à—É —Å–≤—è–∑—å –∫—Ä–µ–ø—á–µ. –Ø atesorar –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π."**

<CultureTip flag="üá™üá∏" title="–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è —é–±–∏–ª–µ–µ–≤">
–†–∞–∑–Ω—ã–µ el aniversario a√±os –∏–º–µ—é—Ç —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è: –ø–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è (–±—É–º–∞–∂–Ω–∞—è), –ø—è—Ç–∞—è (–¥–µ—Ä–µ–≤—è–Ω–Ω–∞—è), –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è (–æ–ª–æ–≤—è–Ω–Ω–∞—è), –¥–≤–∞–¥—Ü–∞—Ç—å –ø—è—Ç–∞—è (—Å–µ—Ä–µ–±—Ä—è–Ω–∞—è) –∏ –ø—è—Ç–∏–¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è (–∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è). –≠—Ç–∏ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–∏ —Å—Ö–æ–∂–∏ –≤–æ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö —Ä–µ–≥–∏–æ–Ω–∞—Ö, –≥–¥–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ.
</CultureTip>

## –ü–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞–º

### –ü–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞
**"–û–¥–∏–Ω –≥–æ–¥ el amor, —Å–º–µ—Ö–∞ –∏ —Å—á–∞—Å—Ç—å—è. –ü–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –∏–∑ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã—Ö a√±os juntos!"**

### –ü—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞
**"–ü—è—Ç—å a√±os —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è el recuerdo –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ. –¢—ã –≤—Å—ë –µ—â—ë –≤—ã–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—à—å —É –º–µ–Ω—è –±–∞–±–æ—á–µ–∫ –≤ –∂–∏–≤–æ—Ç–µ."**

### –î–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞
**"–î–µ—Å—è—Ç–∏–ª–µ—Ç–∏–µ el amor! –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π ‚Äî –ø–æ–¥–∞—Ä–æ–∫, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π —è atesorar."**

### –î–≤–∞–¥—Ü–∞—Ç—å –ø—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ (—Å–µ—Ä–µ–±—Ä—è–Ω–∞—è)
**"–î–≤–∞–¥—Ü–∞—Ç—å –ø—è—Ç—å a√±os el amor –∏ —ç—Ç–æ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–æ. –¢—ã –º–æ—è –≤–µ–ª–∏—á–∞–π—à–∞—è el hito."**

### –ü—è—Ç–∏–¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ (–∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è)
**"–ü—è—Ç—å–¥–µ—Å—è—Ç a√±os juntos ‚Äî –∑–æ–ª–æ—Ç–∞—è –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è el amor. –¢—ã –º–æ—ë siempre."**

## –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã –¥–ª—è –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–æ–∫

| –°–ª—É—á–∞–π | –ü–æ—Å–ª–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ Spanish | –ó–Ω–∞—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ |
|---|---|---|
| –õ—é–±–æ–π –≥–æ–¥ | Feliz aniversario –º–æ—è el amor | –° –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–æ–π, –ª—é–±–æ–≤—å –º–æ—è |
| –ü–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ | –ù–∞—à–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–∞—è el aniversario! | –ü—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–≥–æ –≥–æ–¥–∞ |
| –û—Å–æ–±—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ | el hito el aniversario | –í–∞–∂–Ω–∞—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω–∞ |
| –ö–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –≥–æ–¥ | siempre juntos | –í–µ—á–Ω–æ–µ –µ–¥–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ |

## –ü–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∑–¥–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≥–æ–¥–æ–≤—â–∏–Ω—ã

### –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ –∏–¥–µ–∏
1. –ù–∞–ø–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–∫—É –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ
2. –í—ã—É—á–∏—Ç–µ –ø–µ—Å–Ω—é –æ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π
3. –ü—Ä–∏–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤—å—Ç–µ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —É–∂–∏–Ω
4. –°–ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –ø–æ–µ–∑–¥–∫—É –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—É, –≥–¥–µ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—è—Ç –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ

### –í—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏
- **–°–ø–∞—Å–∏–±–æ –∑–∞ –∫–∞–∂–¥—ã–π –¥–µ–Ω—å** - –ó–∞ –µ–∂–µ–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω—É—é —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç—å
- **–Ø –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä–µ–Ω(–Ω–∞) –∑–∞ –Ω–∞—à—É –∂–∏–∑–Ω—å –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ** - –ó–∞ –≤–∞—à–µ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω—ë—Ä—Å—Ç–≤–æ
- **–¢—ã ‚Äî –ª—É—á—à–µ–µ, —á—Ç–æ —Å–ª—É—á–∏–ª–æ—Å—å —Å–æ –º–Ω–æ–π** - –°–∞–º—ã–π –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–π –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç

## –°–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–µ—Ç–µ–π

### –ü–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø—É–±–ª–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–π
- **X a√±os —Å undefined** - –í–µ—Ö–∞
- **juntos siempre** - –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–µ –∏ —Å–ª–∞–¥–∫–æ–µ
- **Feliz aniversario –º–æ–µ–π –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –ø–æ–ª–æ–≤–∏–Ω–∫–µ** - –¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ

## –ö—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–∏–π —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–æ—á–Ω–∏–∫

| –¶–µ–ª—å | –§—Ä–∞–∑–∞ |
|---|---|
| –ü—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–∏–µ | Feliz aniversario! |
| –í—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ª—é–±–≤–∏ | –Ø el amor —Ç–µ–±—è |
| –°–º–æ—Ç—Ä—è –≤–ø–µ—Ä—ë–¥ | –ù–∞ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ a√±os |
| –ü–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ | juntos siempre |

–ü—É—Å—Ç—å –∫–∞–∂–¥–∞—è el aniversario –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–∞–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —è–∑—ã–∫–µ –Ω–∞–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–µ—Ç –≤–∞–º –æ —Å–∏–ª–µ –≤–∞—à–µ–π el amor. –°–ª–æ–≤–∞ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å –≤–æ—Å–ø–æ–º–∏–Ω–∞–Ω–∏—è, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—É—Ç—Å—è siempre.

<CTA />
